signup_text: Create your sicuro.com account now and use our escrow service to secure your online transactions.
signup_success_text: Your registration has successfully been processed. An account activation e-mail has been sent to your e-mail address. Please check your email and follow the instructions in the e-mail to activate your account. Please make sure to activate your account within the next 48 hours, otherwise the activation link will expire.
organisation_name_missing: Name of your organisation is mandatory
reset_password_text: Please enter the email address you used to create your account. You will receive a link with which you can create a new password.
reset_password_success_text: Your password has successfully been reseted and an e-mail with your new password has been sent to your login e-mail address. Please check your e-mail, and follow the instructions in the e-mail to log into Sicuro.
reset_password_failure_text: <strong>Unfortunately we could not process your request. We are already working on a solution.<strong>
